paper_title: Computational Electromagnetics with the RBF-FD Method
abstract: One of the most popular methods employed in computational electromagnetics is the Finite Difference Time Domain (FDTD) method. We generalise it to a meshless setting using the Radial Basis Function generated Finite Difference (RBF-FD) method and investigate its properties on a simple test problem.
publication_venue: SpliTech 2023 Conference paper, 4 pages, 3 figures, preprint
